      • launchGame

        java.util.UUID launchGame(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> hostsUUIDs,
                          java.util.List<java.util.UUID> moderatorsUUIDs,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> whiteListedPlayers,
                          int playerMax)
        Launch a game
        Parameters:
        hostsUUIDs - The list of hosts'UUIDs
        moderatorsUUIDs - The list of moderators'UUIDs
        whiteListedPlayers - The list of whitListed players'names
        playerMax - maximum number of players
        Returns:
        UUID of the create game
